references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it provides the technical details of GPT-4, a large language model used in RealCompo for layout generation.
This foundational paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, the core technology behind many text-to-image diffusion models, including those used in RealCompo.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a high-resolution text-to-image diffusion model that serves as a key component in RealCompo for achieving high realism.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper introduces DALL-E 2, a prominent text-to-image model used as a fidelity model in RealCompo, which greatly improves the realism of the generated images.
This paper introduces GLIGEN, a layout-to-image model that is utilized in RealCompo as a spatial-aware model, effectively enhancing the compositionality of the generated images.
